text:
e="preserve">Héctor Suárez Hernández (October 21, 1938 – June 2, 2020) was a Mexican actor and comedian. Suárez was best known for many roles in Mexican comedy. He also starred in "Cesar Chavez". He was known for his roles in "National Mechanics", "El buscabullas" and "El derecho de nacer".
Suárez died on June 2, 2020 in Mexico City from bladder cancer, aged 81.
